patthana1.1:2.1_0: Hetupaccayo, ārammaṇapaccayo, adhipatipaccayo, anantarapaccayo, samanantarapaccayo, sahajātapaccayo, aññamaññapaccayo, nissayapaccayo, upanissayapaccayo, purejātapaccayo, pacchājātapaccayo, āsevanapaccayo, kammapaccayo, vipākapaccayo, āhārapaccayo, indriyapaccayo, jhānapaccayo, maggapaccayo, sampayuttapaccayo, vippayuttapaccayo, atthipaccayo, natthipaccayo, vigatapaccayo, avigatapaccayoti.
patthana1.1:4.1_0: **Hetupaccayo**ti—hetū hetusampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:5.1_1: Saddāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:5.1_2: Gandhāyatanaṁ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:5.1_3: Rasāyatanaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:5.1_4: Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:5.1_5: Rūpāyatanaṁ saddāyatanaṁ gandhāyatanaṁ rasāyatanaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:5.1_6: Sabbe dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:6.1_0: Yaṁ yaṁ dhammaṁ ārabbha ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā, te te dhammā tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:7.1_0: **Adhipatipaccayo**ti—chandādhipati chandasampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:7.1_1: Vīriyādhipati vīriyasampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:7.1_2: Cittādhipati cittasampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:7.1_3: Vīmaṁsādhipati vīmaṁsasampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:8.1_0: Yaṁ yaṁ dhammaṁ garuṁ katvā ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā, te te dhammā tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:9.1_0: **Anantarapaccayo**ti—cakkhuviññāṇadhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:9.1_1: Manodhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:10.1_0: Sotaviññāṇadhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:10.1_1: Manodhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:11.1_0: Ghānaviññāṇadhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:11.1_1: Manodhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:12.1_0: Jivhāviññāṇadhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:12.1_1: Manodhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:13.1_0: Kāyaviññāṇadhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:13.1_1: Manodhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:14.1_0: Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:14.1_1: Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ abyākatānaṁ dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:15.1_0: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:15.1_1: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ abyākatānaṁ dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:16.1_0: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ abyākatānaṁ dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:16.1_1: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:16.1_2: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:17.1_0: Yesaṁ yesaṁ dhammānaṁ anantarā ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā, te te dhammā tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:18.1_0: **Samanantarapaccayo**ti—cakkhuviññāṇadhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:18.1_1: Manodhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:19.1_0: Sotaviññāṇadhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:19.1_1: Manodhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:20.1_0: Ghānaviññāṇadhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:20.1_1: Manodhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:21.1_0: Jivhāviññāṇadhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:21.1_1: Manodhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:22.1_0: Kāyaviññāṇadhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:22.1_1: Manodhātu taṁsampayuttakā ca dhammā manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:23.1_0: Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:23.1_1: Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ abyākatānaṁ dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:24.1_0: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:24.1_1: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ abyākatānaṁ dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:25.1_0: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ abyākatānaṁ dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:25.1_1: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:25.1_2: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:26.1_0: Yesaṁ yesaṁ dhammānaṁ samanantarā ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā, te te dhammā tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:27.1_3: Cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:27.1_5: Rūpino dhammā arūpīnaṁ dhammānaṁ kiñci kāle sahajātapaccayena paccayo, kiñci kāle na sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:29.1_3: Cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:30.1_0: Cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:30.1_1: Sotāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:30.1_2: Ghānāyatanaṁ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:30.1_3: Jivhāyatanaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:30.1_4: Kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:30.1_5: Yaṁ rūpaṁ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti, taṁ rūpaṁ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:31.1_0: **Upanissayapaccayo**ti—purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:31.1_1: Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ kesañci upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:31.1_2: Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ abyākatānaṁ dhammānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:32.1_0: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:32.1_1: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ kesañci upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:32.1_2: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ abyākatānaṁ dhammānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:33.1_0: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ abyākatānaṁ dhammānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:33.1_1: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:33.1_2: Purimā purimā abyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:35.1_1: Sotāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:35.1_2: Ghānāyatanaṁ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:35.1_3: Jivhāyatanaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:35.1_4: Kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:36.1_0: Rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:36.1_1: Saddāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:36.1_2: Gandhāyatanaṁ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:36.1_3: Rasāyatanaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:36.1_4: Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:36.1_5: Rūpāyatanaṁ saddāyatanaṁ gandhāyatanaṁ rasāyatanaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:37.1_0: Yaṁ rūpaṁ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti, taṁ rūpaṁ manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:37.1_1: Manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ kiñci kāle purejātapaccayena paccayo, kiñci kāle na purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:38.1_0: **Pacchājātapaccayo**ti—pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:39.1_0: **Āsevanapaccayo**ti—purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:39.1_1: Purimā purimā akusalā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:39.1_2: Purimā purimā kiriyābyākatā dhammā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ kiriyābyākatānaṁ dhammānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:40.1_0: **Kammapaccayo**ti—kusalākusalaṁ kammaṁ vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:40.1_1: Cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:41.1_0: **Vipākapaccayo**ti—vipākā cattāro khandhā arūpino aññamaññaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:42.1_1: Arūpino āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:43.1_1: Sotindriyaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:43.1_2: Ghānindriyaṁ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:43.1_3: Jivhindriyaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:43.1_4: Kāyindriyaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:44.1_0: Arūpino indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:45.1_0: **Jhānapaccayo**ti—jhānaṅgāni jhānasampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ jhānapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:46.1_0: **Maggapaccayo**ti—maggaṅgāni maggasampayuttakānaṁ dhammānaṁ taṁsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ maggapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:48.1_1: Arūpino dhammā rūpīnaṁ dhammānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:49.1_3: Cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:50.1_0: Cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:50.1_1: Sotāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:50.1_2: Ghānāyatanaṁ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:50.1_3: Jivhāyatanaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:50.1_4: Kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:51.1_0: Rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:51.1_1: Saddāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:51.1_2: Gandhāyatanaṁ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:51.1_3: Rasāyatanaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:51.1_4: Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:51.1_5: Rūpāyatanaṁ saddāyatanaṁ gandhāyatanaṁ rasāyatanaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:52.1_0: Yaṁ rūpaṁ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti, taṁ rūpaṁ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:53.1_0: **Natthipaccayo**ti—samanantaraniruddhā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṁ cittacetasikānaṁ dhammānaṁ natthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:54.1_0: **Vigatapaccayo**ti—samanantaravigatā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṁ cittacetasikānaṁ dhammānaṁ vigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:55.1_3: Cittacetasikā dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:56.1_0: Cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:56.1_1: Sotāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:56.1_2: Ghānāyatanaṁ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:56.1_3: Jivhāyatanaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:56.1_4: Kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:57.1_0: Rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:57.1_1: Saddāyatanaṁ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:57.1_2: Gandhāyatanaṁ ghānaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:57.1_3: Rasāyatanaṁ jivhāviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:57.1_4: Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:57.1_5: Rūpāyatanaṁ saddāyatanaṁ gandhāyatanaṁ rasāyatanaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ manodhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.1:58.1_0: Yaṁ rūpaṁ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti, taṁ rūpaṁ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ avigatapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.1:68.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana1.1:69.1_0: (Yathā hetupaccayo vitthārito, evaṁ ārammaṇapaccayopi vitthāretabbo vācanāmaggena.)
patthana1.1:70.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya adhipatipaccayā …
patthana1.1:71.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya avigatapaccayā …pe…
patthana1.1:71.1_6: kusalañca akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya …
patthana1.1:71.1_9: kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ …
patthana1.1:71.1_10: akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ …
patthana1.1:71.1_11: kusalo ca akusalo ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ …
patthana1.1:71.1_12: kusalo ca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ avigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:72.1_0: (Yathā hetupaccayo vitthārito, evaṁ avigatapaccayopi vitthāretabbo vācanāmaggena.)
patthana1.1:74.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā …pe…
patthana1.1:74.1_1: siyā kusalañca akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo ca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjeyyuṁ hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana1.1:75.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā adhipatipaccayā …pe…
patthana1.1:77.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā …pe…
patthana1.1:79.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā anantarapaccayā …pe…
patthana1.1:81.1_1: Ekamūlakaṁ, dumūlakaṁ, timūlakaṁ, catumūlakaṁ, pañcamūlakaṁ, sabbamūlakaṁ asammuyhantena vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana1.1:83.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya ārammaṇapaccayā hetupaccayā …
patthana1.1:84.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya adhipatipaccayā …
patthana1.1:86.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.1:87.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā …
patthana1.1:88.1_0: (Ekekassa padassa ekamūlakaṁ, dumūlakaṁ, timūlakaṁ, catumūlakaṁ, pañcamūlakaṁ, sabbamūlakaṁ asammuyhantena vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana1.1:90.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya nahetupaccayā.
patthana1.1:91.1_0: (Yathā anulome hetupaccayo vitthārito, evaṁ paccanīyepi nahetupaccayo vitthāretabbo.)
patthana1.1:92.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya naārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.1:93.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā ….
patthana1.1:94.1_0: (Yathā anulome ekekassa padassa ekamūlakaṁ, dumūlakaṁ, timūlakaṁ, catumūlakaṁ, yāva tevīsatimūlakaṁ evaṁ paccanīyepi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana1.1:96.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.1:96.1_1: siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana1.1:97.1_0: (Yathā anulome hetupaccayo vitthārito, evaṁ anulomapaccanīyepi padaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana1.1:98.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā naadhipatipaccayā …
patthana1.1:99.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā naadhipatipaccayā …
patthana1.1:102.1_0: Hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā anantarapaccayā samanantarapaccayā sahajātapaccayā aññamaññapaccayā nissayapaccayā upanissayapaccayā purejātapaccayā pacchājātapaccayā āsevanapaccayā kammapaccayā vipākapaccayā āhārapaccayā indriyapaccayā jhānapaccayā maggapaccayā sampayuttapaccayā vippayuttapaccayā atthipaccayā natthipaccayā vigatapaccayā noavigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:103.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.1:104.1_0: Avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā …pe… avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā novigatapaccayā.
patthana1.1:106.1_0: Avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā anantarapaccayā samanantarapaccayā sahajātapaccayā …pe…
patthana1.1:108.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya nahetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana1.1:108.1_1: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya nahetupaccayā adhipatipaccayā …pe…
patthana1.1:109.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā …pe…
patthana1.1:112.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya naārammaṇapaccayā hetupaccayā.
patthana1.1:113.1_0: Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya naārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā …pe…
patthana1.1:114.1_0: Noavigatapaccayā nahetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā …pe… noavigatapaccayā nahetupaccayā vigatapaccayā.
